job_title: Programmer Assistant in Caracas, Capital District
pros: Competitive salary, relatively good benefits and insurance
cons: Authoritarian and arbitrary top management. Don’t evolve according to the new work market conditions.

review_title: great personal reward, unclear hr policies
pros: great place to work if you feel like you wanna make a difference for children, especially in developing countries, possibility to travel and know other countries and cultures
cons: sometimes you see people advance in their careers because of contacts and personal preferences, rather than for their real skills and knowledge
